```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
acc_2017 <- read.csv(file = "ACC_2017_22.csv", header = T)
tran_2015 <- read.csv(file = "trank_data_15.csv", header = F)
tran_2016 <- read.csv(file = "trank_data_16.csv", header = F)
tran_2017 <- read.csv(file = "trank_data_17.csv", header = F)
tran_2018 <- read.csv(file = "trank_data_18.csv", header = F)
tran_2019 <- read.csv(file = "trank_data_19.csv", header = F)
tran_2020 <- read.csv(file = "trank_data_20.csv", header = F)
tran_2021 <- read.csv(file = "trank_data_21.csv", header = F)
tran_2022 <- read.csv(file = "trank_data_22.csv", header = F)
``` 

```{r}
old_conference = c("SEC", "SEC", "American East", "Big 12", "WCC", "Big South", "C-USA", "C-USA", "C-USA", "C-USA", "AAC", "CAA", "Pac-12", "MWC", "Big East", "Ivy", "CAA", "CAA", "CAA", "Big East", "CAA", "AAC", "AAC", "Southern", "SEC", "ASUN", "Atlantic 10", "Atlantic 10", "AAC", "Big 10", "Big 10", "MVC", "Patriot", "Big East", "C-USA", "C-USA", "ACC", "Horizon", "SEC", "SEC", "Big 10", "Big 10", "WAC", "MEAC", "Big Sky", "Big 12", "Big 12", "Big 12", "ACC", "Big East", "MAAC", "Big South", "C-USA", "C-USA", "Atlantic 10", "Northeast", "Atlantic 10", "Southern", "Southern", "WCC", "AAC", "Big East", "Pac-12", "American East", "American East", "Big 12", "Big 12", "AAC", "CAA", "MWC", "Pac-12", "Pac-12", "Pac-12", "SEC", "Big East", "ACC", "Southern", "Southern", "MAC", "CAA", "Southern", "Southern", "Ivy", "Horizon")
tran_team <- 
  tibble(
    player = acc_2017$PLAYER,
    year = acc_2017$YEAR.1,
    old_team = acc_2017$OLD.TEAM,
    new_team = acc_2017$TEAM,
    grade = acc_2017$YEAR
   ) %>% 
  arrange(old_team, year)
tran_team <- cbind(tran_team, old_conference)
tran_team <- tran_team %>% 
  arrange(old_conference,old_team,year)
length(unique(tran_team$old_conference))
# There are 26 conferences (out of 32 total conferences) that have transferred a total of 84 players into the ACC over the past 5 years, so we're still definitely dealing with a very small sample size throughout...
```
